summary: highlights files containing assembly for UDVM
name: udvm.vim
description:
Universal Decompresor Virtual Machine is defined in RFC3320 (SigComp). 
It has an assembly language whose definition can be found in the draft draft-ietf-rohc-sigcomp-user-guide-01.
install_details:
Edit your .vimrc, myfiletypefile and mysyntaxfile accordingly.
For examples on how to do it please see the vim helpfiles.
